name: archetyped
description: A Typescript implementation of Architect: A Simple yet powerful plugin system for node applications
author: earthican

scripts.test: tsc -p tests/tsconfig.json && copyfiles demos/calculator/**/*.json tests/build/ && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true mocha -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register tests/**/*.spec.ts && rm -rf tests/build
scripts.build:http-demo: DIR=`pwd` && cd demos/simple-web-server && npm install && cd $DIR && tsc -p demos/simple-web-server/tsconfig.json && copyfiles demos/simple-web-server/**/*.{json,html} demos/simple-web-server/build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf tests/build && rm -rf demos/simple-web-server/build
